description: This returns restore jobs that contain the specified protected resource. You must include ResourceArn. You can optionally include NextToken, ByStatus, MaxResults, ByRecoveryPointCreationDateAfter , and ByRecoveryPointCreationDateBefore.

parameters.name: ResourceArn
parameters.description: Returns only restore jobs that match the specified resource Amazon Resource Name (ARN).

nested_items.name: RestoreJobs
nested_items.description: An array of objects that contain detailed information about jobs to restore saved resources.>

nested_items.name: AccountId
nested_items.description: The account ID that owns the restore job.

nested_items.name: RestoreJobId
nested_items.description: Uniquely identifies the job that restores a recovery point.

nested_items.name: RecoveryPointArn
nested_items.description: An ARN that uniquely identifies a recovery point; for example, arn:aws:backup:us-east-1:123456789012:recovery-point:1EB3B5E7-9EB0-435A-A80B-108B488B0D45.

nested_items.name: CreationDate
nested_items.description: The date and time a restore job is created, in Unix format and Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). The value of CreationDate is accurate to milliseconds. For example, the value 1516925490.087 represents Friday, January 26, 2018 12:11:30.087 AM.

nested_items.name: CompletionDate
nested_items.description: The date and time a job to restore a recovery point is completed, in Unix format and Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). The value of CompletionDate is accurate to milliseconds. For example, the value 1516925490.087 represents Friday, January 26, 2018 12:11:30.087 AM.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: A status code specifying the state of the job initiated by Backup to restore a recovery point.

nested_items.name: StatusMessage
nested_items.description: A detailed message explaining the status of the job to restore a recovery point.

nested_items.name: PercentDone
nested_items.description: Contains an estimated percentage complete of a job at the time the job status was queried.

nested_items.name: BackupSizeInBytes
nested_items.description: The size, in bytes, of the restored resource.

nested_items.name: IamRoleArn
nested_items.description: The IAM role ARN used to create the target recovery point; for example, arn:aws:iam::123456789012:role/S3Access.

nested_items.name: ExpectedCompletionTimeMinutes
nested_items.description: The amount of time in minutes that a job restoring a recovery point is expected to take.

nested_items.name: CreatedResourceArn
nested_items.description: An Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that uniquely identifies a resource. The format of the ARN depends on the resource type.

nested_items.name: ResourceType
nested_items.description: The resource type of the listed restore jobs; for example, an Amazon Elastic Block Store (Amazon EBS) volume or an Amazon Relational Database Service (Amazon RDS) database. For Windows Volume Shadow Copy Service (VSS) backups, the only supported resource type is Amazon EC2.

nested_items.name: RecoveryPointCreationDate
nested_items.description: The date on which a recovery point was created.

nested_items.name: CreatedBy
nested_items.description: Contains identifying information about the creation of a restore job.

nested_items.name: RestoreTestingPlanArn
nested_items.description: An Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that uniquely identifies a restore testing plan.

nested_items.name: ValidationStatus
nested_items.description: The status of validation run on the indicated restore job.

nested_items.name: ValidationStatusMessage
nested_items.description: This describes the status of validation run on the indicated restore job.

nested_items.name: DeletionStatus
nested_items.description: This notes the status of the data generated by the restore test. The status may be Deleting, Failed, or Successful.

nested_items.name: DeletionStatusMessage
nested_items.description: This describes the restore job deletion status.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The next item following a partial list of returned items. For example, if a request is made to return MaxResults number of items, NextToken allows youto return more items in your list starting at the location pointed to by the next token.
